name: TinyChef
0: ”Alexa, tell klove chef that I am cooking sizzling pasta”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: klove chef
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Have a lunch party, holiday dinner, or even just a simple family meal, call your smart assistant to help.
 Just say, “Alexa, open Tiny Chef”! 

The Tiny Chef Skill on Amazon Alexa is your virtual sous-chef who can help you find recipes, shop ingredients and prepare together your favorite dishes. Always ready to help, Tiny Chef has a curated library of thousands of delicious, easy to cook, healthy and trusted recipes from celebrity Chefs and best selling Cookbooks. Get chef tips and step-by-step cooking instructions. By linking your Alexa account, Tiny Chef will learn about your preferences and diet restrictions and will suggest the most relevant recipes. 

Cooking has never been as easy and fun! Try it now, it's free. 

To get started, just say “Alexa, Open tiny chef” then once you are on the skill, you can try these...

- Wondering what to cook for dinner? Just say “Show me dinner recipes”
- Worried about food waste? Tiny Chef can help! Just say “Empty my fridge”
- Need help with grocery shopping? Just say, “Add the ingredients of Pecan Butter Tarts to my shopping list.”
- Need gluten-free recipes? “Show me gluten-free recipes.”
- In the mood for a spicy Indian dish? Just ask “Show me a spicy Indian recipe” 

Tiny Chef can help you with reminders and Chef tips. You can even ask Tiny Chef to break down the recipe into simple steps if you are learning how to cook.
